meaningMnemonic: There's a <radical>canopy</radical> and a man called the <radical>Yoga</radical> <radical>King</radical> standing in the middle of your <kanji>garden</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: Not only is this Yoga King taking over your <kanji>garden</kanji>, but he's ordering you to serve food to his class. "You there, peasant, fetch these people your freshest <reading>ta</reading>ter (てい) tots from this puny garden to give them strength."
